summary: Meditate at High Hrothgar to turn your Dragon Souls into Perk Points.
descriptionHtml:
In commemoration of almost 1000 total dl\'s I present you with: An Update!
The shrine now plays a VFX and sound on the player when it is used. \\o/

===========
DESCRIPTION
===========

A tiny mod that adds a shrine behind High Hrothgar. (On the cliff behind the gate where the Whirlwind Sprint test happens)  

This shrine, when activated, will allow you to meditate to convert a configurable number of Dragon Souls into a single perk point. (Default is 10)

I haven\'t noticed any bugs in my own testing.  If you find any, let me know.

==============
REQUIREMENTS
==============

Does NOT require skse. Only vanilla Skyrim (With the latest patch (1.8)) is required for this mod to work.

=============
CONFIGURATION
=============

To change the required number of souls open the console in game with the \"~\" key and type


set csdPerkCost to #


Change # to whatever amount you feel is needed.  This number will then be used in the script and shrine message.
==============
COMPATIBILITY
==============

Compatibility issues should be minimal as only a single cell is modified.

=============
INSTALLATION
=============

Using WinRAR, extract the contents of csdSoulstoPerks.rar to your Skyrim Data folder.  
When prompted, say yes to add my script to your script folder.
Make sure csd_SoulsMeditation is checked in your mod list.

===========
CHANGELOG
===========
------
-v1.1-
------
Added a visual effect and sound for your viewing pleasure

-----
-v1b-
-----
Spelling error corrected \\o/ yay

----
-v1-
----
Shrine added to High Hrothgar exterior
author: cscottydont
